Name: Stadscaf√© Oosterdok
Review Text: i went to use the toilet which they charge 50 cents if not ordering food which is fair, however, i ended up ordering a very late lunch. i had butcher's sandwich with roast beef on multigrain roll for euro 7.50. it was reasonably priced and good basic sandwich.

Name: Stadscaf√© Oosterdok
Review Text: Very nice place. The staff is friendly and the sandwiches are reasonably priced for what you get. We eat here often with work and everything on the menu tastes great.  Usually the service is quite fast as well. They also have an outside seating area for when it is nice weather

Review Text: I love the mini sandwiches. they are a bit expensive (for german standards) but taste exceptionally well. best enjoyed outside looking over the water. High Quality. …

Name: Stadscaf√© Oosterdok
Review Text: Really good. I visited today (24 April 18) for a quick lunch. Location is great...really close to Amsterdam Centraal and also the Hilton Hotel. Prices are reasonable and the food we ordered was delicious. Staff were friendly, and we loved the vibe. Quick service too... can't wait to use again!

Name: Stadscaf√© Oosterdok
Review Text: I found the food very good and enjoyed every bit. I had the B&B steak warmed sandwich which was mouth watering. Staff was very nice and chilled out atmosphere.

Name: Stadscaf√© Oosterdok
Review Text: Good coffee, good brunch with fried eggs. Sandwiches are a bit on the small portion side, and cappucino was a bit watery but drinkable. Friendly staff!
